TextBody:
Hello Duvan,

Thank you for contacting the Endpoint Protector support team.
One of our Support Engineers will assist you soon with your case during your local business hours.

Could you please let us know your timezone and also your availability for a remote session?



Kind regards

TextBody:
Hi Duvan,

Unfortunately, we don't have a Spanish speaking colleague at the moment.
If we can do it in English, I can schedule the remote session on Friday.

Best regards,
